text: There will be no power supply in the following areas from 9 a.m. to 3 p.m. on February 15 due to maintenance work on the Poolampatti sub-station: Poolampatti; Koodakkal; Pillukurichi; Vanniyarnagar; Valaiyasettiyur; Kallukadai; Sithur; Oruvapatti; Kunjampalayam; Vellarivelli; Nedunkulam; Koneripatti; Kalvadangam; Poomaniyur; Ponnampalayam and the surrounding villages.
title: power shutdown
